SELECT b.orderCode,c.realName,b.loanType,b.productCode,d.name,c.mobile,b.loanId,b.loanTime,b.applyAmount,b.annualRate,b.loanPeriod,a.repaymentId,a.repayDate ,DATEDIFF(now(),a.repayDate) as overdue,a.repayStyle ,a.repayPeriod,a.stillPrincipal from t_loan_repayment a left join t_loan b on a.loanId = b.loanId left join t_loan_person c on a.loanId = c.loanId left join t_loan_product d on b.productCode = d.code WHERE 1=1
AND a.repayStatus = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y%m%d") > DATE_FORMAT(a.repayDate,"%Y%m%d")
AND a.repayStatus = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(a.repayDate,"%Y%m%d") >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y%m%d") AND 1>TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,a.repayDate,now())
AND a.repayStatus = 2
AND c.cname like '%${cname}%'
AND c.cid in
#{item}
AND c.realName like '%${realName}%'
AND c.mobile like '%${mobile}%'
ORDER BY overdue DESC
ORDER BY b.loanTime DESC
LIMIT #{beginCount},#{pageSize}

SELECT a.loanId,a.orderCode,c.realName,a.loanTime,b.repayDate,b.repayStatus, d.name,a.loanType,c.mobile,a.applyAmount,a.loanPeriod,a.annualRate, b.repayStyle,b.stillRepayAll,a.loanAmount FROM t_loan a LEFT JOIN t_loan_repayment b ON a.loanId=b.loanId LEFT JOIN t_loan_person c ON a.loanId=c.loanId LEFT JOIN t_loan_product d ON a.productCode = d.code WHERE a.loanStatus='REPAYING'
AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)=0
AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)<0 AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)>=-3
AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)>0 AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)<=3
AND DATEDIFF(now(),b.repayDate)>4
ORDER BY a.loanTime DESC ,a.loanId

SELECT a.loanId,b.realName,b.mobile,a.applyAmount,a.loanPeriod,c.repayPeriod ,c.repayDate,c.stillPrincipal,c.stillInterest,c.lateFI FROM t_loan a, t_loan_person b, t_loan_repayment c WHERE a.loanId = #{loanId} and a.loanId = b.loanId and a.loanId = c.loanId and c.repayPeriod = #{repayPeriod}
select * from t_loan_repayment where loanId=#{loanId} ORDER BY repayPeriod ASC
